document_data.name: Thilren Sohj
document_data.mainbody: '''Thilren Sohj''' was a [[Zhentarim]] spy inside the [[Cult of the Dragon]] in [[1489 DR]].
document_data.History: In 1489 DR, Thilren managed to infiltrate the Cult under the orders of his [[Zhent]] masters. He passed to [[Welsea Parenthe]] information about the Cult's interest in [[Yarash]]'s pyramid. When Welsea and the [[Lord Sage of Phlan]] sent adventurers to discover the secrets of the pyramid for them, she also asked the adventurers to extract Thilren if possible.{{Cite adventurers league/Dark Pyramid of Sorcerer's Isle|9}} They were too late, however, because Thilren's contingent of cultists were all slain in the [[Quivering Forest]] by an [[elven]] party.{{Cite adventurers league/Dark Pyramid of Sorcerer's Isle|13}}
